EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314 - Q115.Invite - Melbourne
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - Melbourne
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/2015/melbourne?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-roadshow> Join Pivotal technologists and learn how to build and deploy great software on a modern cloud platform.
At this workshop, you’ll get hands-on experience as you test drive Pivotal’s CF platform. In just a few hours, you’ll realize the speed and ease of pushing an application on Pivotal CF.
Who Should Attend
The workshops cover topics of interest to developers, architects, operations and technical managers. The keynotes set the stage for the workshops and will provide valuable insights for all.
AGENDA
8:30 AM – 9:00 AM
Registration & Breakfast
9:00 AM – 10:00 AM
Keynote: Software Kept Eating the World
10:00 AM – 10:30 AM
Innovation: Who's Doing It Using PaaS?
10:30 AM – 10:45 AM
Morning Tea
10:45 AM – 12:00 PM
Lab 1 - The Developer Experience
12:00 PM – 12:30 PM
Lunch
12:30 PM – 2:00 PM
Workshop - Lab 2 - Architecture and the Operator Experience
Register <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/2015/melbourne?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-roadshow> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. TUESDAY
June 16, 2015
Cliftons Melbourne
Level 1, 440 Collins Street
Melbourne REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/2015/melbourne?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-roadshow>
